org.apache.juneau.rest

Interface BasicRestConfig

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicRestServlet, BasicRestServletGroup, BasicRestServletJena, BasicRestServletJenaGroup, ConfigResource, DebugResource, DirectoryResource, HelloWorldResource, LogsResource, RemoteableServlet, RootResources, SampleRootResource, ShutdownResource

    @RestResource(serializers={HtmlDocSerializer.class,HtmlStrippedDocSerializer.class,HtmlSchemaDocSerializer.class,JsonSerializer.class,JsonSerializer.Simple.class,JsonSchemaSerializer.class,XmlDocSerializer.class,XmlSchemaDocSerializer.class,UonSerializer.class,UrlEncodingSerializer.class,MsgPackSerializer.class,SoapXmlSerializer.class,PlainTextSerializer.class},
              parsers={JsonParser.class,XmlParser.class,HtmlParser.class,UonParser.class,UrlEncodingParser.class,MsgPackParser.class,PlainTextParser.class},
              properties=@Property(name="Serializer.uriResolution.s",value="ROOT_RELATIVE"),
              htmldoc=,
              config="$S{juneau.configFile}",
              staticFiles={"htdocs:htdocs","styles:styles"})
public interface BasicRestConfig
    Basic configuration for a REST resource.

    Classes that don't extend from BasicRestServlet can implement this interface to be configured with the same serializers/parsers/etc... as BasicRestServlet.
